long_description: The Burton Mint snowboard boots are lightweight, soft-flexing all-mountain snowboard boots that feature a broken-in feel so you can experience comfort from day one. Women-specific True Fit(TM) Design creates boots and bindings specifically for the way a woman rides, ensuring complete control, total power and ultimate fun. Streamlined Speed Zone(TM) shell lacing system lets you fine-tune the fit quickly and easily; personalize the upper and lower zones in a matter of seconds. Mint boots have Imprint 1 EVA liners with long-lasting power panels that wrap feet in comfort; they'll conform to your feet after several days of riding for ultimate comfort. Soft-flexing, slim 3D-molded tongues wrap your forefeet in comfort, offer a seamless flex and reduce performance-robbing shell/liner stack-up. Grip Fit backstays mate with binding grip zones to secure a locked-and-loaded response. Snowproof internal gussets on boot tongues completely seal lower boot zones to keep feet warm and dry. Durable outsoles feature EVA cushion in heels and rubber ice spikes on the soles for incredible traction on slippery surfaces.
short_description: The Burton Mint snowboard boots are lightweight, soft-flexing all-mountain snowboard boots that feature a broken-in feel so you can experience comfort from day one.
